main.models

Class PlayerModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.models.PlayerModel

  • public class PlayerModel
extends java.lang.Object
    this class contains the information about the plsyer sech as color , army in hand the list of the cards he own which called deck , the list of countries he owned .
